translations.value: What should you do in the following scenarios?

The red marks located in this warehouse will take you to different scenarios. When you click on a red marker, a situation will be described and you will have to answer a question. After answering the question you will receive an explanation as to what the correct answer is. Every time you answer a question correctly you will get a star.
You are going to the canteen with your colleague. You are walking side by side on the left side of the path in this picture. Are you allowed to do this?
1. Yes, the path on the left is for pedestrians going to the canteen.
2. No, you have to walk on the right side of the path. Always stay on the right side as much as possible.
3. No, the path is too narrow to walk side by side.
4. No, you are not allowed to walk on this path. This entire path is for Automated Guided Vehicles (AGVs).

Designated walkways are important because they can prevent collisions between people and machines.

Always follow the designated routes and be aware of the potential dangers around you.

In this situation, there is a walking path on the left side leading to the canteen. But this path is not wide enough to walk shoulder to shoulder. So in this situation you have to walk one after the other on the left side of the path.

Automated Guided Vehicles (AGVs) are very quiet and carry heavy goods. So it is safer to walk in different lanes where possible.

The truck driver has left six pallets of big boxes on the dock.

Your team leader asks you to put them in the right place with the pallet truck in the warehouse. You can see the related order form. You can also see more details about the pallet truck you can use. What you should do?
1. You should take the pallet truck and put the pallets one by one at the right place.
2. You should tell your team leader that a pallet truck is not suitable for transporting these pallets.
3. You should ask your colleague to move the pallets with the forklift.

The order form states that the weight of the pallets is 2750 kg. Your pallet truck states that it has a load capacity of 2500 kg.

All work equipment should be used only within specified limits. With this pallet truck you can move loads weighing 2500 kg or less.

It may be possible to move 2750 kg of pallets with this pallet truck, but it is not officially allowed as it can create a dangerous situation.

Tell your team leader that this pallet truck is not suitable because the pallets are too heavy. 

You can probably move these pallets with a forklift but this dock may not allow forklifts to be used on it. So first inform your team leader that the pallet truck is not suitable for this job.
